name: Loki: Agent of Asgard #10
summary: In the aftermath of AXIS, Loki is the Hero Of Asgard no more. But one change remains: The God of Lies can only ever tell the truth. Now, Loki's brother, the Odinson, visits his apartment, to talk of cabbages, kings... and Kid Loki. This is it.

relations.title: Loki: Agent of Asgard Volume 2: I Cannot Tell a Lie
